    • Method Detail

      • retrieveLoadConfiguration

        void retrieveLoadConfiguration(String paymentAccountTypeUri,
                             String paymentAccountNetworkTypeUri)
        Retrieve load configuration. Passing null values for both paymentAccountTypeUri and paymentAccountNetworkTypeUri will provide all load configurations.
        Parameters:
        paymentAccountTypeUri - the payment account type URI
        paymentAccountNetworkTypeUri - the payment account network type URI

      • setGiftAccountManagementListener

        void setGiftAccountManagementListener(IGiftAccountManagementListener listner)
        Sets the gift account management listener.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the giftAccount management listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2

      • loadPaymentInstrument

        void loadPaymentInstrument(LoadPaymentAccountParameters loadPaymentAccountParameters)
        Provides the facility to load/reload funds to a payment account. This also provides support to provision a payment account and load funds.
        1. If the loadPaymentAccountParameters parameter instance's LoadPaymentAccountParameters.getLoadingAccount() is populated with ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountType(), ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountNetworkType() and ProvisionCard.getAdditionalData() and without any values assigned for ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountUri(), a new payment instrument would be provisioned and loaded with the specified amounts.
        2. If the loadPaymentAccountParameters parameter instance contains ProvisionCard.getPaymentAccountUri() value, then the specified amount will be loaded/reloaded to an existing account.
        Parameters:
        loadPaymentAccountParameters - parameters required to load, reload or provision payment accounts with funds.
        Since:
        4.7.0.1
        See Also:
        IGiftAccountManagerFacade.loadPaymentInstrument(LoadPaymentAccountParameters), IGiftAccountManagerService.loadPaymentInstrument(LoadPaymentAccountParameters)
